author: cms-tau-pog
body:
Dear all, 

this is a subsequent fix of unit tests in the TopQuarkAnalysis system as pointed out by Chris Jones (*). This is a minimal fix to the PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/21022 and should close this development step for the time being. We will envisage a better solution using eras in the midterm. All changes are on the level of final cfg files in test directories. Upon an independent test I confirm that tauID-related problems are indeed fixed. 

Cheers,
Roger

(*)
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/21022#issuecomment-341917032
title: Temporary fix of TQAF unit tests after TauID update
